feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.25.6
entry.content:
Added

  • In the map settings (top left corner of the map), you can now select colors for your colored routes. #682

Changed

  • Import edit page now allows to edit import name.
  • Importing data now does not create a notification for the user.
  • Updating stats now does not create a notification for the user.

Fixed

  • Fixed a bug where an import was failing due to partial file download. #1069 #1073 #1024 #1051

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Lemur, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters and Jonah B. on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump pry-byebug from 3.10.1 to 3.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1056
  • Release/0 25 6 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1091
  • Bump httparty from 0.22.0 to 0.23.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1086
  • Add speed color scale setting by @MeijiRestored in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1020
  • Bump sidekiq-cron from 2.1.0 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1085
  • Bump rexml from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1084
  • 0.25.6 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1092

New Contributors

  • @MeijiRestored made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1020

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.25.5...0.25.6

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.25.8
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Database was not being created if it didn't exist. #1076

Removed

  • RAILS_MASTER_KEY environment variable is no longer being set. You can safely remove it from your environment variables.

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.25.10
entry.content:
Added

  • Vector maps are supported in non-self-hosted mode.
  • Credentials for Sidekiq UI are now being set via environment variables: SIDEKIQ_USERNAME and SIDEKIQ_PASSWORD. Default credentials are sidekiq and password. If you don't set them, in self-hosted mode, Sidekiq UI will not be protected by basic auth.
  • New import page now shows progress of the upload.

Changed

  • Datetime is now being displayed with seconds in the Points page. #1088
  • Imported files are now being uploaded via direct uploads.
  • /api/v1/points endpoint now creates accepted points synchronously.

Removed

  • Sample points are no longer being imported automatically for new users.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Lemur, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters, GregF, Jon Coffee, Lukas, Robbie G, Kilian, Hans G, Chris, tabaha, Andre, Michael C and Jonah B. on Patreon and KoFi ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Feature/pmtiles by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1129
  • Feature/dokku deployment by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1130
  • Fix/protomaps leaflet by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1134

  • Bump strong_migrations from 2.2.0 to 2.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1144
  • Bump rails from 8.0.1 to 8.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1145
  • 0.25.10 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1131

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.25.9...0.25.10
